How is the poll biased? 

 
 Lets see.
 
 "Do You Support Pie Throwings at Conservatives like Hannity or Ann Coulter?"
 
 " Yes, because I am a liberal who doesn't respect any human life"
 
 The answer is unrelated to the question. Throwing a pie is not disrespecting human life. Also, the "because" is pointless. You can support it for other reasons than the one given.

 "Do you support raping young children?"
 
 "Yes because I am a Christian"
